Whether Valve is lazy, out of ideas, or letting their well guarded, top-secret boons simmer on the back burner is anyone's guess, but one thing I do know is they can make a great game if they want to.  If you soak up the awesome solo campaign and multiplayer campaign and you just NEED MORE, the custom map community has got your back.  For the currently listed 10 bucks, nothing can and will go wrong.

A good sequel to an amazing puzzle game that came out in 2007. This game has a great story a plenty of extras to play around with. The coop is fun to play with a friend. I found the test chamber frustrating but fun! This is a good game to test your skill.

This is such a great puzzle game. The story was well done and had me laughing a lot. Glados is definitely one of my favorite game villains. I feel like the complexity of the puzzles is balanced well so that it's not too easy or too difficult. I played multiplayer mode with a twelve year old family member and had a lot of fun, so if you have a kid, it's a good one to play with them.
engaging, fun, not too hard or frustrating.  puzzle is more important than key stroke combinations.
it is a short but mind-boggling puzzle game that has very alive and funny cutscenes and commentary that will keep you invested!
Five stars!!!
